title: Georgia governor allows businesses to forego COVID mandates as hospitals run out of ICU beds
content:
1. Georgia governor allows businesses to forego COVID mandates as hospitals run out of ICU beds  CBS News
  2. Georgia Gov. Kemp signs order allowing businesses to ignore local mask, vaccine mandates  Yahoo News
  3. Gov. Brian Kemp says private businesses do not have to follow local COVID ordinances  11Alive
  4. Mayors of Georgia cities — including Athens — pen open letter about Kemp, mask-wearing  Online Athens
  5. Kemp: Businesses aren't mask police  CBS46 Atlanta
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Georgia governor allows businesses to forego COVID mandates as hospitals run out of ICU beds  CBS News
Georgia Gov. Kemp signs order allowing businesses to ignore local mask, vaccine mandates  Yahoo News
Gov. Brian Kemp says private businesses do not have to follow local COVID ordinances  11Alive

localize.title: ジョージア州知事、病院のICUベッドが不足する中、企業にCOVID義務化の見送りを許可
